column1: ## Purpose: Audit log of all HR data changes and mutations over time.
## Provides complete traceability of who changed what
## - MutationID: Unique sequential identifier for each change record
## - Timestamp: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the change occurred (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ)
## - ChangedBy: User ID of the person who made the change
## - ChangedFor: User ID of the person whose data was changed
## - FieldChanged: Specific field that was modified (Salary
## - OldValue: Previous value before the change (N/A for new records)
## - NewValue: New value after the change
## - Environment: System environment where change occurred (HRProd
## - Metadata: Additional context about the change in JSON-like format
## - change_investigation: Status code for agentic investigation workflow (Pending
## - ManagerID: UserID of the manager responsible for validation
